# tableView

**Instance Property**

The table view that contains the table column.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var tableView: NSTableView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You should never need to set this property; it’s set automatically when you add a table column to a table view using the `NSTableView` class’s method [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/addTableColumn(_:)].

## Related Documentation

- **addTableColumn(_:)**: Adds the specified column as the last column of the table view.
